law.catch_line: The Commission consists of 7 members appointed by the Governor....

section.section: The Commission consists of 7 members appointed by the Governor.
Of the 7 members, 4 shall be individuals who do not have any connection with the management or policy of any facility.

text.section: Each member shall be interested in problems of health care.

section.section: The term of a member is 4 years.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who serves 2 consecutive full 4-year terms may not be reappointed for 4 years after completion of those terms.

When appointing a member to fill a vacancy due to the expiration of a member's term, the Governor shall give consideration to, and make appointments when appropriate, that would promote the racial, gender, and geographic diversity of the Commission.
